acf.product_description: A versatile brush cutter designed for various tasks, offering a reliable and efficient performance with its unique H.E.R.E Technology and ergonomic design.
acf.detailed_description:
A versatile brush cutter designed for various tasks, offering a reliable and efficient performance with its unique H.E.R.E Technology and ergonomic design.

Brand: Maruyama | Model: BC2321H-RS

Key Specifications:

  • Dimensions (LxWxH): 1780x730x465 mm
  • Dry Weight: 6.1 kg
  • Engine: CER230 (22.5cc)
  • Output: 0.77 kw
  • Fuel tank: 0.45 L

Key Features:

  • Treaded Clutch Shaft: A solid steel inner drive-shaft threaded at the clutch end, eliminating vibration.
  • H.E.R.E Technology: A unique MARUYAMA engineered system for low emission, high power, and high fuel efficiency, EU stage 2 compliant.
  • Ergonomic Design Handle Grip: Superior comfort and excellent balance for the user.
  • Reverse Start 2: A fast and easy starter system, incorporating the best features of an electric starter.

features.title: Treaded Clutch Shaft
